segments.text: Excuse me , sir , since my train leaves at 16:00 . Have you a 3 - hour tour ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are lucky , sir . We are about to set out . It's a tour to the White House .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I have just missed the place . How long does the tour take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 2 hours . You won't get late for your train .
segments.speaker: S2
